snippet: The country has asked the United Nations Security Council to investigate a vessel the Yemeni authorities said was carrying Iranian-made missiles, rockets and other weapons.
abstract: Yemen asks United Nations Security Council to investigate ship Yemeni authorities say they seized in January that was carrying cargo of Iranian-made missiles, rockets and other weapons; Yemeni Pres Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi has asked Pres Mahmoud Ahmadinejad of Iran to stop sending arms to Yemen and supporting southern separatist movement there.
lead_paragraph: The country has asked the United Nations Security Council to investigate a vessel the Yemeni authorities said was carrying Iranian-made missiles, rockets and other weapons.

headline.seo: Yemen Asks U.N. to Investigate Seized Arms Cargo
headline.main: Yemen Seeks Investigation of Seized Arms
headline.print_headline: Yemen Seeks Investigation Of Seized Arms
